steps.title: How it works
steps.subtitle: Three simple steps to secure your documents on the blockchain

step1.title: Upload
step1.description: Upload your document (PDF, image, text). The system automatically calculates its unique SHA-256 fingerprint.

step2.title: Certify
step2.description: Generate your blockchain certificate and mint a unique NFT. Your document is stored in a decentralized manner on IPFS.

step3.title: Verify
step3.description: Share the QR code or hash to allow anyone to instantly verify the authenticity of your document.
